alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Phelps and northern Harlan Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Orleans, or 15 miles south of Holdrege, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atlanta and Huntley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
